title: Musk's xAI needs SpaceX deal for the money. Data centers in space are still a dream
summary_full: In merging SpaceX with xAI, Elon Musk may be providing his artificial intelligence startup with a much-needed cash infusion.
summary_public: In merging SpaceX with xAI, Elon Musk may be providing his artificial intelligence startup with a much-needed cash infusion.
